result.description: Whether the bank has an automated system for inventorising all IT assets ?
Has the bank implemented Database Activity Monitoring (DAM) (Yes/NO)
Whether logs of DAM are integrated in SIEM ?
Does changing customer/employee information (either sensitive fields or information/data having financial implication) from the backend generate any alert for an independent review ?
Has the bank deployed any 'containerised app' model for mobile banking applications?
